seo: 用友U8-Cloud,XXE漏洞,接口安全,XChangServlet,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测用友U8-Cloud系统的XChangServlet接口是否存在XXE漏洞，通过构造特定的XML请求并结合DNSLog验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the XChangServlet interface of Yonyou U8-Cloud system has XXE vulnerability by constructing specific XML requests and combining DNSLog to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
